data.text: Pen bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl ak, ne Stipen nop agak, Takaw nep apal anɨb ak, nɨŋɨd apal akaŋ agak?

7.2 Stt 11.31 Agek Stipen agak, Bapi mam sɨkop, nɨgɨm agak.7.2-3 Stt 12.1 Based yes chɨn Eblaham, bɨlel taun Halan ma amnak, man Mesopodemiya nep yolɨgup agak. Mɨdaknɨŋ, God Bɨawl tep yɨbɨl chɨn ak nop ap nɨgak agak. Ap nɨŋɨd, God ne nop agak,
Man nak awl kelɨgɨl, binɨb nak okok kelɨgɨl, man yad nep agñɨnɨgayn ak amnɨmɨn agak.
7.4 Stt 11.31, 12.4 Agek, Eblaham ne Kaldiya binɨb man kɨli yolɨgup ak kelɨgɨl, taun Halan am yolɨgup agak. Kɨdek nap ne kumek, God agek, ap yolɨgup man nɨbi nɨm awl agak.

7.5 Stt 12.7, 13.15, 15.3, 15.18, 17.8, 26.3, 48.4, Lo 2.5 Ñɨn anɨb ak, God Eblaham nop man awl wakay olap ma agak, yokɨp ap yolɨgup agak. Ñapay olap ma tɨkak, ñɨn anɨb ak yokɨp yek agak. God pen Eblaham nop agak, Kɨdek man awl anɨb ak, nad dɨnɨgaban agak. Ñapay nad tɨke, tɨkel tɨk dad amɨl tɨkɨnɨgabal okok, man awl anɨb ak abe dɨl yenɨgabal agak.

7.6 Stt 15.16, Kis 12.40, Gal 3.17 Pen God takaw olap agak, Ñapay nad tɨke, tɨkel tɨk dad amɨl tɨkɨnɨgabal okok, am binɨb ogɨnap man kɨli ak yenɨgabal agak.7.6-7 Stt 15.13-14 Mɨdel, binɨb anɨb okok binɨb nak okok kɨlop mɨdupsek nag lɨl, gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨl, nag wog tek aglel gɨnɨgabal, sub anep 400 yɨnɨgab agak.
7.7 Kis 3.12 Binɨb okok kɨlop anɨgɨnɨgabal ak, yad kɨlop gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgayn agak. Pen kɨdek binɨb nak okok man anɨb ak kelɨgɨl, ap yɨp kɨgom yɨmɨl agnɨgɨnɨgabal, man nɨm awl agak.

7.8 Stt 17.10-14, 21.2-4, 25.26, 29.31–35.18 Pen God Eblaham nop takaw ag adek nokom lɨl agak, Ñapay nad tɨke, tɨkel tɨk dad amɨl tɨkɨnɨgabal okok, nɨbop mɨdupsek kod yenɨgayn ak nɨm, wak tɨbɨlɨkɨnɨmɨb agak. Agek, kɨdek Eblaham ñɨne Aysak nop tɨkɨl, ñɨn anep kugul ak mɨdɨl, ñɨn jel ak wak nop ak tɨbɨlɨkak agak. Aysak pen Jekop nop tɨkak agak. Jekop ne pen, ñɨ anep umɨgan ak kɨlop tɨkek nɨm, chɨn Juda binɨb jɨj keke mɨdobun agak.

Based anɨb okok, nɨmam Josep nop nɨgel yɨlɨk gek, nop dɨl bɨ ogɨnap kɨlop ñelak, tawɨl dad man Yijip amnɨlak agak. Amel, bɨ yokɨp wog gɨñeb ak yolɨgup agak. Anɨgɨl mɨdɨl, Josep mɨdtep ma gak ak pen, God ne Josep nop sawl ma gak agak. Ne ayɨp mɨdɨl, mɨŋel ne okok mɨdupsek gɨjuwɨl, Yijip bɨnonɨm nop gos ñak agak. Ñek bɨnonɨm agak, Bɨ Josep anɨb ak, ne nɨgtep yɨbɨl gup agak. Anɨb agɨl, nop agek, kal tap nop okok sek, man Yijip sek kod yolɨgup agak.
Kɨdek ñɨn olap yuwan awl yɨbɨl ak, man Yijip sek, man Kenan sek owak agak. Apek, based chɨn tap mɨdup pɨyow nɨŋɨd, ñɨŋɨnɨgel tek olap ma yek, gos pal yɨbɨl lak agak.
7.12 Stt 42.1-5 Jekop takaw olap nɨgak, tap mɨdup yek man Yijip agak. Ak nɨm based chɨn sɨkop kɨlop ned agyokek, tap mɨdup dɨnɨg amnɨlak agak.

7.13 Stt 45.1, 45.16 Am dɨdad apɨl, ñɨbjuwɨl, tepayaŋ pen dɨnɨg amnɨlak agak. Amjakel, nɨmam Josep kɨlop agak, Mam sɨkop, yad namam nɨbi Josep nep agak. Agek, Yijip bɨnonɨm ak, takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd anɨb agak, Ak Josep nɨmam sɨkop ey agak.
7.14 Stt 45.9-10, 45.17-18, 46.27 Josep pen, bapi Jekop, binɨb ne okok yɨp kasek ownɨgel agɨl, takaw agyokek, bapi Jekop binɨb ne anep 75 dɨl, ayɨp owlak agak.
7.15 Stt 46.1-7, 49.33 Jekop apɨl man Yijip mɨdɨl ne kumak agak. Mɨd dad amɨl, based sɨkop anɨb okok mɨdupsek kumdɨlak agak.

7.16 Stt 23.3-16, 33.19, 50.7-13, Jos 24.32 Kɨlop kamnɨg, dad adɨkɨd taun Sekem amɨl, kamɨlak agak. Taun Sekem anɨb ak, bɨlel based yes Eblaham, ne bɨ Hamol ñɨne sɨkop kɨlop tawɨl, chɨp kameb lum wakay anɨb ak tawak agak.
Pen God Eblaham nop ned gɨnɨgayn agɨl aglak tek gɨnɨg gaknɨŋ, binɨb chɨn okok, kɨli tɨkel amɨl apɨl gɨl, kuŋay yɨbɨl man Yijip yelak agak.7.17-18 Kis 1.7-8
Ñɨn anɨb ak Yijip binɨb bɨnonɨm kɨli kɨdeyɨl olap dɨlak agak. Bɨnonɨm anɨb ak pen, based Josep nop ma nɨgak agak.
7.19 Kis 1.10-22 Ak nɨm, binɨb chɨnop okok kɨlop yepɨs agɨl, gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gak agak. Gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨl, takaw kɨles agek, ñapay kɨli okok tɨkɨl, seŋ okok yokel, ke mɨdɨl kumelɨgɨpal agak.
Anɨgɨlak ak pen, ñɨn anɨb ak, bɨ bel olap ñɨ tep yɨbɨl olap tɨkɨl, yɨb nop Mosis agɨlek agak. Ñɨ anɨb ak nop takan omɨŋal nokom kal mɨgan okok we gel yolɨgup agak.
7.21 Kis 2.3-10 Kɨdek dam seŋayaŋ lelek, Yijip bɨnonɨm payne ak ap nop nɨŋɨd, dad amɨl, ñapay yad agɨl yɨmag lolɨgup agak.
Nop anɨgɨl yɨmag lek awl gek, Yijip binɨb kɨli tɨtay gelɨgɨpal ak, nop agñɨtep gɨlak agak. Ne bɨ takaw kɨles gɨl agɨl, wog kɨles gɨl golɨgup agak.
Pen Mosis sub anep 40 tek yɨn gak ñɨn ak mɨdɨl, ne agak, Binɨb yad Yislel kɨlop am nɨŋɨd owin agak.
Pen ñɨn anɨb ak nɨgak, Yijip bɨ olap, ne bɨ Yislel olap nop gɨ tɨmel gak agak. Mosis nɨŋɨd, Yijip bɨ anop pɨsnep yɨbɨl paklek kumak agak.

Pen Mosis gos ne nɨgak, binɨb yad Yislel binɨb okok, kɨli God Mosis nop gos ñek ap chɨnop kod yenɨgab agak. Chɨnop kod mɨdɨl, kɨdek mɨdtep gɨnɨgabun agɨl gos nɨgɨnɨgabal, ne anɨgɨl gos nɨgak agak. Ak pen mel agak. Gos anɨb ak tek kɨli ma nɨgɨlak agak.
Mɨnek Mosis ap nɨgak, Yislel bɨ omɨŋal penpen gelek agak. Nɨŋɨd anɨb agak, Mam omɨŋal. Ñɨli penpen gebil ak kelɨgɨnɨmil agak.
Agek, bɨne olap tap jɨj gak ak, ne Mosis nop dɨyokɨl agak, Nep an agek, bɨawl mɨdɨl, chɨnop kod mɨdeban agak?
Tolil Yijip bɨ olap paklɨnak ak, mɨñɨl pen yɨp paklɨnɨg apɨl ageban agak?
7.29 Kis 2.21-22, 18.3-4 Anɨb agek, bɨ paklɨpin anɨb ak nepal agɨl, Mosis pɨlɨk man Midiyan amnak agak. Amɨl, bɨ yokɨp olap tek yek agak. Ne bin dɨl, ñɨ omɨŋal tɨkak agak.

Sub anep 40 tek yɨnak ak, Mosis man Midiyan yolɨgup agak. Kɨdek mɨnek olap, am man nep binɨb ma yelak nab okok, Saynay dum wulep okok agak. Pen mɨdɨl nɨgak, ensel olap ap mab bɨd ak mɨdɨl, mab mɨdupsek mɨŋɨlaŋ tek gak agak.
Anɨgek Mosis nɨŋɨd, tap anɨb ak tay gup agɨl, wulep sɨŋak apɨl nɨgaknɨŋ, Bɨawl ne Mosis nop agak.
Anɨb agak, Eblaham ayɨp, Aysak ayɨp, Jekop ayɨp, based yes okok ayɨp, God kɨli yad nokom agak. Anɨb agek, ak God nokom agup agɨl, pɨlɨkɨl nop nɨŋɨd kuyan gak agak.
7.33 Jos 5.15 Pen Bɨawl ne Mosis nop agak, Man anɨb ak yad ke, man suŋtep yɨbɨl mɨdeb, anɨb ak tek tob tɨlup tɨgjuwan agak.

Yad nepin, Yijip binɨb okok, kɨli binɨb yad Yislel kay kɨlop gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gel, chɨb gek chaŋ lɨpal agak. Anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, kɨlop ap dɨnɨgebin agak. Nad tɨkjakan agak. Yad nep agyoken Yijip amnɨmɨn agak.

Yislel binɨb kɨli Mosis nop ned agɨlak, An agek chɨnop kod yenɨgaban agɨlak agak. God pen ensel olap nop agyokek, mab mɨŋɨlaŋ tek gɨlɨg agek, Mosis ne Yislel bɨawl kɨli mɨdɨl, kɨlop dɨnɨg adɨkɨd man Yijip amnak agak.

7.36 Kis 7.3, 12.41, 14.21, 16.1, 16.35, Nam 14.33, Sng 105.27 Yijip amɨl, tap mageptek okok kuŋay yɨbɨl gɨl, Yislel binɨb kɨlop dad ñɨg solwala Nɨkɨm apal ak tɨkɨlak agak. Tɨkɨl kɨd adaŋ amelak, tap mageptek okok gɨ yolɨgup agak. Man nep binɨb ma yelak nab okok mɨdɨl anɨgak, sub anep 40 tek yɨnak agak.
7.37 Lo 8.15, 8.18, Mat 17.5, Apo 3.22 Mosis ne nokom nɨm, Yislel binɨb kɨlop takaw olap agak, God ne kɨdek bɨne gos ñek agñeb ak, yad tek olap agyokek, bɨ nɨb ayɨp mɨdebɨm ak tek olap agak.

7.38 Kis 19.1–20.17, Lo 5.1-33, Ais 63.9, Apo 7.53, Lom 3.2, Gal 3.19, Hib 2.2 Based sɨkop chɨn kɨli man nep binɨb ma yelak nab okok yelɨgɨpal, Mosis ne ayɨp yolɨgup agak. Dum Saynay amek, ensel nop takaw agñak agak. Takaw pel mɨdep ak nop agñak agak. Takaw anɨb ak dɨl, chɨnop agñub agak.
Mosis ne God takaw tep ak agñak ak pen, based chɨn okok takaw agak ak ma nɨgɨlak agak. Kɨli Mosis nop kelɨgɨl, adɨkɨd Yijip amnun agɨl gos ak nɨgɨlak agak.

7.40 Kis 32.1, 32.23 Nɨŋɨd, kɨli Mosis nɨmam Elon nop agɨlak, Namam nad, ne chɨnop Yijip nɨb dad owak ak, akal amub ak ma nopun agɨlak agak. Anɨb ak nad tap chɨn koŋɨm yɨmɨl agnɨgɨnɨgun ogɨnap gɨle, tap anɨb okok ned amek chɨn kɨdek gɨnɨgabun agɨlak agak.7.40 Mosis dum Saynay mɨdɨl God takaw ak dolɨgup anɨb ñɨn ak, kɨli takaw anɨb ak agɨlak.
7.41 Kis 32.2-6, Lo 9.16, Sng 106.19 Anɨb agɨl, tap yepɨs agnɨgep olap, chag bulmakaw ñɨluk tek kɨli ke gɨlak agak. Gɨlel, kɨlop tep gaknɨŋ, tap ñɨŋeb pak dap sɨbog ñɨlak agak.

7.42 Sng 81.12, Jer 19.13, Ese 20.25, 20.39, 2 Te 2.11 Anɨgelak, God kɨlop kelɨgɨl agak, Anɨgɨpal ak, sub, takan, gap okok kɨgom yɨmɨl agnɨgɨlaŋ agak. Ñɨn anɨb ak kɨli tap anɨb okok agnɨgɨlak ak nɨm, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb olap, God agak tek, mɨj ak kɨl tɨkɨl agak,

Nɨbi pen tap yepɨs omɨŋal ke gɨlɨpek ak agnɨgelɨgɨpɨm agɨl tɨkak agak. Tap anɨb ak, olap Molek agelɨgɨpɨm agɨl tɨkak agak. Olap gap tek gɨlɨl, Lepan agelɨgɨpɨm agɨl tɨkak agak. Tap yepɨs omɨŋal anɨb ak nep, mɨj kal gɨ dad ajɨlɨg, agnɨg gɨ yelɨgɨpɨm agɨl tɨkak agak. Gɨpek anɨb ak, yad nɨbop dɨyoken, am man pal yenɨgabɨm, man Babilon bak okok agɨl tɨkak agak.

Stipen anɨb agɨl, takaw olap pen agak, Bɨlel based sɨkop man nep binɨb ma yelak nab okok yelɨgɨpal ñɨn ak, Mosis amek, God nop takaw ogɨnap agɨl agak, Sel kal yɨp agnɨgɨnɨgel olap anɨb anɨb gɨl gɨnɨgel agak. Agek, Mosis apɨl kɨlop agek, kal agak anɨb ak tek gɨlak agak.

7.45 Jos 3.14-17, 18.1, 23.9, Neh 9.24, Sng 44.2, Apo 13.19 Kɨdek, ñapay kɨli okok sel kal anɨb ak dɨl, Josuwa ayɨp sel kal anɨb ak dad owlak agak. Binɨb man anɨb awl yelak okok, God kɨlop pɨsnep yuk yokek, based chɨn man anɨb ak dɨlak agak. Sel kal anɨb ak mɨdɨl, mɨd dad amɨl, kɨdek bɨnonɨm Depid yolɨgup agak.

7.46 1 Sml 16.1, 2 Sml 7.1-16, 1 Kin 8.19, 1 Sto 17.1-14, Sng 89.19, 132.1-5 God Depid nop nɨgek tep gak, Depid ne God nop agnɨŋɨd agak, Yad kal tep olap gen, chɨn Jekop7.46 Bɨ Jekop, yɨb ne olap Yislel agelɨgɨpal. Ne Yislel binɨb based kɨli yolɨgup. ñapay ne okok apɨl, kal anɨb ak mɨgan ayaŋ nep gos nɨŋɨd agnɨgɨnɨgun akaŋ agak?
7.47 1 Kin 6.1-38, 8.20, 1 Sto 17.12, 2 Sto 3.1-17 Anɨb agek ak pen, kɨdek ñɨne Solomon God agnɨgep kal awl agak anɨb ak gak agak.
Pen God Bɨawl yɨbɨl adek alaŋ mɨdeb ak, binɨb ñɨn mɨdup dɨl kal gɨnɨgabal ak, ne kal anɨb ak mɨgan ayaŋ ma yenɨgab agak. Bɨ God gos ñek agñeb olap takaw anɨb ak tɨkɨl agak,
Adekab alaŋ gɨlɨnek ak, besɨg mɨdep yad agɨl tɨkak agak.7.49-50 Ais 66.1-2 Lum awl gɨlɨnek ak, tob yad lɨpin agɨl tɨkak agak. Yɨp kal tay tek ak gɨlem, yad añɨŋ lɨl yenɨgayn agɨl tɨkak agak?
Tap anɨb okok mɨdupsek yad ke gɨlɨnek agɨl tɨkak agak.

Stipen takaw anɨgɨl agɨl anɨb agak, Nɨbi takaw ma nɨŋɨd, tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨpɨm agak. Chɨbol nɨbop ak ma asɨkup agak. Tap lum ayaŋ yɨl gos nepɨm agak. God Kawnan ak nɨbop gos tep ñek nepɨkep ak pen, pel mel apɨm agak. Nased sɨkop gelɨgɨpal tek nep gɨpɨm agak.

7.52 2 Sto 36.16, Mat 21.35, 23.31, 1 Te 2.15 Nased sɨkop kɨli bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok kɨlop mɨdupsek gɨ tɨmel gɨlak agak. Bɨ ogɨnap kɨli God bɨ teplep mɨdeb ne ak ownɨgab agɨlak okok, nased sɨkop kɨli bɨ anɨb okok kɨlop mɨdupsek paklɨlak agak. Nɨbi pen, bɨ teplep anɨb ak apek, mɨmug nɨŋɨd ñapek agak.
7.53 Kis 20.1, Apo 7.38, Gal 3.19, Hib 2.2 Pen takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak, God ensel okok kɨlop agek dad apɨl nɨbop ñɨlak ak, takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd ma dɨpek agak.
Stipen takaw anɨb ak agaknɨŋ, kɨlop mɨlɨk tɨmel yɨbɨl yapek, meg sulɨlɨg kabɨyam julak.
7.55 Mat 22.44, Apo 2.33-34, 5.31, 6.5 Pen God Kawnan ak Stipen ayɨp yek ak nɨm, God man ne alaŋ nɨŋɨd nɨgak, God mɨlek tep sek mɨdɨl, Jisas ñɨn yɨpɨd kɨd sɨŋak yek.
7.56 Ese 1.1, Dan 7.13, Mat 3.16, Apo 10.11, Kol 3.1 Nɨŋɨd anɨb agak, Nɨgɨm. Yad nɨgebin, God man ne alaŋ mɨgan yɨkɨl mɨdeb agak. Bɨ Olap Ñɨne, God ñɨn yɨpɨd kɨd okok ken jakɨl mɨdeb agak.
Stipen anɨb agek, tɨmud kɨli ak pɨl gɨl, nop takaw awl yɨbɨl agɨl, mɨdupsek tɨkjakɨl ap nop chɨchɨk dɨl,

7.58 Lo 13.9, Luk 4.29, Apo 6.13-14, 22.20, Hib 13.12 kal nab kelɨgɨl dad seŋayaŋ ken amnɨlak. Dad amɨl, bɨ nop ag gɨl takaw kɨles agɨlak okok, kabɨyam juwɨl, tiglis kɨli okok tɨg asɨk, bɨ pɨlaj Sol yek wulep sɨŋak lɨlak. Lel, ne kod mɨdaknɨŋ, kɨli Stipen nop kab ju pakɨlak.
Nop anɨgɨl pakɨlaknɨŋ ne agak, Bɨawl Jisas. Kawnan yɨp ak dan agak.
7.60 Mat 5.44, Luk 23.34, Apo 9.40, 21.5 Anɨb agɨl kɨgom yɨmɨl, suk awl yɨbɨl agak, Bɨawl. Yɨp paklebal awl, tap si tap tɨmel gebal ak nɨŋɨd kelɨgɨnɨmɨn agak. Anɨb agɨl kumak.
